Position: Acting Human Resources Manager (HRBP)
Managing the Recruitment and selection process.
Support current and future business needs through the development, engagement, motivation and preservation of human capital.
Consult with line management and provide daily HR guidance.
Work closely with management and employees to improve work relationships, build morals and increase productivity and retention.
Provide HR policy guidance.
Identify training needs for teams and individuals.
Ensure legal compliance throughout human resource management.
Successful Projects Highlight:
Updating employee’s information in Division.
E Archive.
Spread awareness by holding workshops.
Additional Assignments & Responsibilities:
Heading the National Day celebration team.
Leading team within the section in terms of enhancing awareness, conducting workshops.

Position: Customer Services
COMMENT
Highly motivated Human Resource Specialist seeking to obtain responsible and challenging position where my education will have a valuable application.
Key areas of experience
Recruiting & Staffing
Employee Relations
HR Compliance
Interpersonal Skills
Customer Services Development
Future Shaping / Foresight
Problem Solving & Decision Making
Computer Skills:
Content Editing: Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel and PowerPoint)
Ability to work withseveral operating systems, including Windows and Mac OSX
Soft Skills:
Ability to work under pressure
Ability to work independently or as part of a team
Leadership
